form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Oath or Affirmation of Deponent, NARA Form 1024

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 1 have stocks and bonds with the following market value, as indicated on the attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. 00 C I have life insurance in the sum of $ 85,000 With a cash surrender value of $ 00 I own real estate valued at 1,070,000 With mortgages or other encumbrances thereon amounting to $ 641,993 Which is located at See list attached (Street and Number (City) (State) (Zip Code) 8. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place an "X" in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) Name of Person Wholly Dependent Partially Dependent Age Relationship to Me NA NA NA NA NA NA NA NA NA 9. That I have previously submitted affidavit(s) of support for the following person(s). If none, state "None" Name Date submitted NONE NONE 10. That I have submitted visa petition(s) to the Immigration and Naturalization Service on behalf of the following person(s). If none, state none. Name Relationship Date submitted none NA none NA (Complete this block only if the person named in item 3 will be in the United States temporarily.) That I do intend do not intend, to make specific contributions to the support of the person named in item 3. (If you check "do intend", indicate the exact nature and duration of the contributions. For example, if you intend to furnish room and board, state for how long and, if money. state the amount in United States dollars and state whether it is to be given in a lump sum, weekly, or monthly, or for how long.) Room and Board for three years OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF DEPONENT I acknowledge at that I have read Part III of the Instructions, Sponsor and Alien Liability, and am aws Ary O an immigrant sponsor under the Social Security Act, as amended, and the Food Stamp Act, as amen I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this affidavit signed by me and the statements are true and Signature of deponent \ Dharmandra Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 28 Swarns day Anguis of My commission expires on Notary Commission Betty Public Lancastes Exnires District March of SHORS 14 Columbia at 2000 Signature of Officer Administering Oath Title If affidavit prepared by other than deponent, please complete the following: declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the deponent and is based on all information of which I have knowledge. They (Signature) (Address) (Date)
